body: But in chapter 2 she improves the switch so now it also affects small titty girls and gives them huge titties, and then she makes a third improvement at the end of the story, but the gist of it is that he got them all pregnant, including his cousin who is the one that invented the switch.

A switch which only affects big-titted girls by making them horny and their tits incredibly sensitive. The radius of effect is 30 metres so it affects all the hot girls around him. That's all you need to know. The rest is mostly dirty talk.
If someone would like this scanlated into english(for a fee obviously) contact me at sebastianhalltls@gmail.com and we can work something out :)
Waiting forever for translated Momiyama comics
